title: Unexpected values of function parameters in for loops
body:
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Compile and run attached code


What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Even though the offset variable is increased inside the loop, the file offset 
seems to be using only the value from the first iteration of the loop never 
advancing. 


What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

GOOS = linux & darwin
GOARCH = amd64
compiler used: 6g
